name: patchmon
description: PatchMon is a self-hosted solution for patch management for small IT teams. It helps track available updates, automate installations, and manage system patching schedules through a clean web UI.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor available system updates across multiple servers and workstations from centralized dashboard

features.title: Automated Patching
features.description: Schedule and automate patch installations during maintenance windows to reduce manual intervention

features.title: Patch Scheduling
features.description: Configure maintenance windows and deployment schedules to control when updates are applied to systems

features.title: System Inventory
features.description: Track installed software, versions, and patch status across infrastructure for compliance reporting

features.title: Compliance Reporting
features.description: Generate reports on patch status and compliance levels to meet security and regulatory requirements

features.title: Rollback Support
features.description: Revert problematic patches to previous versions if updates cause issues or compatibility problems

features.title: Multi
features.description: Manage patches across different operating systems including Linux distributions from single interface

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts for critical updates, failed installations, or systems requiring attention
